titleStmt.title: Reflexions upon the controversy about the oath of allegiance, occasion'd by the letter in answer to English loyalty

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges-Head, in Chancery-Lane; and James Vade, at the Cock and Sugar-Loaf, in Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
